channel.title: Windows 7: Need permission from my own account
channel.description:
I've just reinstalled Windows 7, and I'm trying to delete some old shit. I took ownership and gave myself full permissions, but when I try to delete it, it's telling me I need permission from [i]my own account[/i]. Wtf?
Any thoughts?
edit: these commands in cmd work: takeown /f <foldername> /r /d y icacls <foldername> /grant administrators:F /T
pretty fucked up that you even need to do that though :|

item.title: Windows 7: Need permission from my own account
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
I’ve just reinstalled Windows 7, and I’m trying to delete some old shit.
I took ownership and gave myself full permissions, but when I try to delete it, it’s telling me I need permission from my own account. Wtf?

Any thoughts?

edit:
these commands in cmd work:
takeown /f /r /d y
icacls /grant administrators:F /T

pretty fucked up that you even need to do that though

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7: Need permission from my own account
